mapper.select: SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT inId FROM eqpt_inrepository WHERE inId = #{inId}
SELECT outId FROM eqpt_outrepository WHERE outId = #{outId}
SELECT inId FROM eqpt_inrepository WHERE inId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{inId},'%'))
SELECT DISTINCT wdbh AS inId FROM w_rccgddhtpsd

SELECT w_rccgddhtpsd.wlbh AS materialId,w_rccgddhtpsd.wlmc AS materialName,w_rccgddhtpsd.ggxh AS spec,w_rccgddhtpsd.cgsl AS inNum,w_rccgddhtpsd.jydh AS 'check',w_rccgddhtpsd.pch_xlh AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_rccgddhtpsd WHERE wdbh = #{wdbh} AND eqpt_material.id = w_rccgddhtpsd.wlbh
